title: The Rush of Betrayal: Absolution
description: This version is "Out of Print" and no longer available.Deciding the best way to avenge her family’s loss is to stop the man who ordered their deaths; Josephine Hewes hunts for a way to thwart Lord Ragget’s plans and uncovers a diabolical power struggle occurring within the city that threatens to drag the entire country into war. She has played many roles on stage, but can she become the heroine when the lines are her own and the death scenes are for real?Meanwhile, with the royal family, the chief inquisitor, the captain of the royal guard, and his wife all aligned against him, accused king slayer, foreign ambassador Lord Ian Weatherall doesn’t stand a chance in hell of surviving the next few days unless his remaining friends, a ship-less ship captain and an aging knight with bad knees can find a way to save him. In this novel of jealousy, violence, sex, greed, intrigue and cold-hearted ambition, strange alliances are made, friendships are tested and heroes will fall.
author: Shawn Wickersheim
